changes.reasoning: Improve visual styling and spacing for reasoning headers in TrackingVisualizer. Increased padding from px-4 py-3 to px-6 py-4, made text larger (text-base), added better line height (leading-relaxed), increased gap between dot and text to gap-3, added shadow-sm to cards, and improved file header padding to py-3.

Apply matching styling improvements to PRDiffViewer for consistency. Added same padding, spacing, and typography improvements as TrackingVisualizer. Enhanced commit info display with better spacing (mb-3, gap-2) and improved code badge padding (py-1).
